title: Shatter Me
description: I have a curse.I have a gift.I'm a monster.I'm more than human.My touch is lethal.My touch is power.I am their weapon.I will fight back.No one knows why Juliette's touch is fatal, but The Reestablishment has plans for her. Plans to use her as a weapon. But Juliette has plans of her own. After a lifetime without freedom, she's finally discovering a strength to fight back for the very first timeâ€”and to find a future with the one boy she thought she'd lost forever.
author: Tahereh Mafi
